sentences.en: ...a contralto who has overtaxed her voice.
sentences.cn: ...嗓子过度工作的一位女低音。

sentences.en: A good coach has to make sure not overtax his star players.
sentences.cn: 一名优秀的教练要知道如何保证不让自己的明星球员体能负荷过重.
不要对我的选民征收苛捐杂税!
不要对我们机构苛以重税.
放松一下, 别劳累过度.

sentences.en: You can't help a country by overtaxing its people.
sentences.cn: 你不能以对人民课以重税的方式来帮助国家。

trans.tran_en: to make someone do more than they are really able to do, so that they become very tired

trans.tran_cn: 使负担过重，使过度疲劳，对…征税过重
